title: Manage Resale Ticket Authenticity
description: A guest bought a ticket from a third-party resale site and wants to verify if it's authentic before the event.

tasks.description: Explain that the venue cannot guarantee the authenticity of tickets bought from unofficial resellers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the venue's policy and the risks of using resale sites.

tasks.description: Offer to look up the ticket's barcode in the system as a courtesy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent agrees to check the barcode.

tasks.description: Check the barcode and inform the guest if it is a valid, unscanned ticket in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the ticket is valid in the system but reiterates that they cannot guarantee it hasn't been sold to multiple people.
